channel.title: Istio on REDtalks.live
channel.description: Recent content in Istio on REDtalks.live

item.title: REDtalks.live #025: MiniKube for Dev's
item.description: Another great episode from our F5 Incubator friends, ApsenMesh.io. In this episode I’m joined by Sr Architect, Andrew Jenkins, who explains how, in mere seconds, he spins up Kubernetes clusters on his laptop in a docker container.

item.title: REDtalks.live #023 - Aspen Mesh w/ Shawn Wormke
item.description: Want to learn about Service Mesh? Well, you’re in luck! Today I am joined by Shawn Wormke, Sr. Director of Aspen Mesh – aspenmesh.io – an F5 Networks Incubator innovation. Aspen Mesh is an ’enterprise service mesh’ built on Istio.
